name: Muscle Ranking Vol.3: Saikyou No Challenger TanJou
description: Kinniku Banzuke Vol.3: Saikyou no Challenger Tanjyou! is a sports game, developed and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2000 on PlayStation.

name: Wheel of Fortune: New Second Edition
description: Based on the original Wheel of Fortune game by ShareData, the New Second Edition includes more than a thousand new phrases to guess.

name: Canada Break: Head to Head
description: Canada Break Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated Canadian themed items tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: Kingdom Eighties
description: When the mysterious Greed threatens a small middle-American town, a rag-tag band of brave kids are dragged into an epic struggle of seemingly insurmountable odds to save their families, their neighborhood, and their town.

name: Girl Doll Toy: Tamashii o Kudasai
Once in a Lifetime
description: Once in a Lifetime is a choice-based visual novel made in Ren'Py with tons of romance, mystery, humor, and much more!

name: Eternum
description: Eternum is a choice-based visual novel made in Ren'py with tons of romance, mystery, humor, and much more!

name: Adventures of Quin85
description: The game is a 2D action Platformer themed around the community of twitch streamer Quin69. It is currently in early access on Steam. Aside from cursing in some dialogue it is generally family friendly.

name: Santa Clicker Tycoon
description:
You are Santa and it is your job to make enough presents to make everyone happy during Christmas. The virus hit Santa hard, as he has lost his entire workforce. So you must start from scratch, and make sure everyone has a happy Christmas.
Luckily you will be able to hire new elves, and other things, with your newly created presents.

name: Where the Demon Lurks
description: Where the Demon Lurks is a mostly kinetic SFW visual novel with a few branching parts, and some occasional fan service.

name: Seven Doorways
description:
Inspired by the idea of daily exploration, Seven Doorways presents you with a different environment depending on which day of the week it is when you run it.

It's an exercise in slowing down and not worrying about goals or mechanics. There's nothing to do but hang out for a little while and enjoy your surroundings. Feel no pressure to stay, leave when you want and visit again another day for a new experience.

name: Sift Heads
description: A stickman sniper game where the objective to eliminate the enemies and complete the objectives in each level.

name: Saint Seiya: Legends of Justice
description: Saint Seiya: Legends of Justice is a licensed adaptation of the Saint Seiya manga, produced by the original team, with high-quality graphics that recreate the classic plot. Follow Seiya, Ikki, Shiryu, Hyoga, and Shun as they venture into the Sanctuary, challenge the 12 Gold Saints, destroy the Pope's conspiracy, and save the goddess Athena.

name: Gold and Glory: The Road to El Dorado
description: Discover the legendary lost city of gold! Brave 20 huge levels of danger. Battle Cortes and his minions. Search swamps, rainforests, the Spanish Galleon and El Dorado itself. Survive and the reward is yours.

name: Idly God
description:
Idly God is a short and relaxing idle game about being a god and slowly filling your own universe.

Discover all the actions to unlock and all the menu buttons for a soothing and fulfilling experience inspired by classic idle games like the Candy Box 2.

name: Green Wind
description: A 2D shmup by x.x game room.

name: The President
description:
Hey Mr President! Win the white house like a boss in your office while playing the best president simulator game! Your ministers are waiting for you to make the most important decisions as Mr President!

Win the white house and become the best president ever. This president simulator game will make you feel like a real boss of the state and get respect of everyone!

name: Time on Frog Island: Prologue
description: Help an old axolotl bring life back to a dying island in the Time on Frog Island Prologue - a small, self-contained, mini adventure and prelude to the full Trading Time game. Download the prologue for free and be sure to wishlist the full game if you enjoyed this first mini-adventure.

name: On Sunday
description:
Minimalistic in style, this game brings you on an unusual Sunday walk.
Are these dangers of the outer world or of your own soul?

name: Soulframe
description:
This free-to-play open world adventure heavily influenced by themes of nature, restoration, and exploration.

Soulframe will deliver its own independent and uniquely immersive experience led by the creative and imaginative minds behind Warframe.

name: Arcade Archives: Dragon Saber
description: A powerful legend of immortal dragons

name: Sofiya and the Ancient Clan
description: Sofiya and the Ancient Clan is a traditional side-scrolling action platformer presented in vibrant pixel art style with fluid animations. Run, jump and cast spells as you traverse hills and forests, caverns, castle walls, graveyards and more. Use your magic to trigger secret switches, make new platforms appear, incapacitate guards or take down vicious ogres, ghosts and a wide variety of other enemy types. Face off against monstrous bosses at the end of each region you clear, and victory will be rewarded with saucy unlockable images to fill your gallery!

name: Sparrow Solitaire
description:
Sparrow Solitaire takes the classic tile-matching puzzle game mahjong solitaire, and reimagines it from the ground-up for Playdate. With simple rules and plenty of customizable options, the game is accessible to both new players and veterans of the genre.

Choose from hundreds of layouts, including classics from the original Shanghai to designs referencing other Playdate games. Can’t decide? Play the Daily Layout and share your scores via QR code!

Customize almost every aspect of your experience: tile designs, backgrounds, music, and controls. Or create new layouts with a built-in editor. We also include several helpful options, such as a 2x zoom.

Play against a friend in the 2P challenge mode, or try the alternative matching rules in the Shisen-sho variant.

With some of the most robust stat tracking found on Playdate, you can track your scores, wins, times, and more for each layout.

name: Nom Nom Nom
description: A delicious arcade game of eating and drinking.

name: OneBit Frogger
description: Classic arcade Frogger gameplay for your PlayDate console.

name: Hiddenverse: The Iron Tower
description: Help Sarah sneak into the Iron Tower and sabotage the evil lord's dark devices.

name: Demon Go!
description: A little demon determined to escape from a terrible hell! Jump and dash to the last gate of hell to avoid enemies and obstacles. The terrible demons will try to stop us from escaping, If you rescue the cute cat and clear the challenge, you will definitely escape! Just remember jump and dash!

name: Tropi
description: Tropi is a horizontally-scrolling shoot 'em up set in the Caribbean Sea. You play as the titular Tropi. With the help of his friend and caretaker, Carmen, the two must go out and fight against aliens who have from sprung from the Bermuda Triangle and are terrorizing the surrounding area.

name: Jumping!
description: Jumping！ is a side-scrolling pixel-jumping game that allows you to experience how to avoid falling platforms by jumping on your PC.

name: Police on Duty
description: The city is in danger. Hooligans began to attack everywhere. Welcome in the action-racing game of Police on Duty. It's your chance to keep order in the city!

name: OnlyFap Simulator 2
description: OnlyFap Simulator 2 is a casual clicker adult game that looks like a popular social media.You should help main character to earn enough money to start making streams. After every reached goal you gonna be surprised with amazing video with female protagonist.

name: Dark Deity: Suns Out, Swords Out
description: Step into the world of Terrazael…and get tanned! In this DLC package, explore additional stories from before and after the events of the base game to learn more about some of your favorite characters and see how well they can rock those board shorts!

name: Acassia
description: Tank, action and shooting game, where does it start your new adventure in a world of science fiction and interplanetary wars...

name: Animal Shelter Simulator: Puppies & Kittens
description: This time our pupils in the shelter will be small dogs and kittens. In this unique DLC, you'll be able to look after kittens and puppies from an early age. There will also be tons of other great features in the DLC, check it out for yourself!

name: The Last Fighter
description: You are a lone fighter who was thrown into the jungle. Defeat pirates, smugglers and bandits, get out of the dangerous jungle alive!

name: Chess Dungeons
description: Help the white pieces escape by solving chess puzzles ranging from beginner-level to more experienced challenges in this dungeon-themed sokoban-style game.

name: Glory of War
description: Glory of War is a nostalgic strategic turn-based RPG that combines the SLG mechanics.

name: Endless Chaos: Hordes of the Afterlife
description: Hack and slash your way through thousands of enemies in this action-packed casual game with rougelike features. Level up and gain access to a variety of abilities that will either increase your chances of surviving or get you killed even quicker.

name: Soccer But Different
description: It's Soccer except you can randomize the map, change the ball, and strap ice cubes to everyone's feet... finally some good sports!

name: Earth's Center of Gravity
description: Earth's Center of Gravity is a mystic horror visual novel with multiple endings. The story revolves around Tower Antiques. "No one remembers how long Tower Antiques was there. But it remembers everyone. Even the ones who did not visit it yet." Tower Antiques is waiting for you to write your story.

name: Old Retro Shooter
description: A shooter inspired by old shooters like Doom, Heretic.

name: Faustian Bargain
description: Faustian Bargain, first-person horror game that brings a new and different twist to the thriller and survival-horror genres. After the Ouija sessions, immerse yourself in the tragedies of the victims and a story between reality and the supernatural. Play a hero whose life is between dark and light.

name: Myth of Mirka
description: Choose your own adventure in this visual novel about government experiments gone wrong.

name: Box Runner!
description: "Box Runner! " is a 2D platform jumping game, the game is simple to operate, the atmosphere is relaxed, and the cartoon picture is suitable for casual play for a while.

name: Tiki Tiki Hop
description: "TikiTikiHop" is a cartoon style casual game. The game is easy to operate and suitable for playing for a while in your spare time.

name: Sokorun: One Box
description: Sokorun: one box, it's a sokoban game, with minimalist and pixel graphics style. A classic dungeon game. Avoid the traps, activate the buttons, unlock the doors and help little Logan scape.

name: DoDodge2020
description: a simple bullet dodge game with customizable content.

name: One Week By Car
description: Explore a small, story-rich world reflecting the struggles of college life. Play mini-games to complete the everyday tasks that you need to survive. Eventually, try to find a way to break the cycle of monotony and escape your bleak surroundings.

name: Pizza Delivery Bagel
description: Work the most insane pizza delivery job of all time, and try to make as much money as possible before you get fired!

name: Hell Madness
description: The leaders of the hellish hordes descended to earth and now plunge the world into an abyss of pain and suffering, but the servants of light took the side of the mortals and swore to protect the earth from the sinister hands of the servants of the underworld!

name: CozyTyper
description: CozyTyper is a relaxing game where you can enjoy a cozy atmosphere while you spend your time improving your typing accuracy and speed, without the pressure of a ticking clock. Take your touch typing to the next level with calm practice and muscle memory training! Slow is smooth, smooth is fast.

name: Elementals: The Magic Key
description: In "Elementals: The Magic Key" you have to help Albert, a young magician, restore the Key of Eiron and save his sister kidnapped by Sibelius, a wicked sorcerer. Solve brain-teasing puzzles, search hidden items and try your hand at challenging board battles in this amazing hidden object game.

name: Noodle Party
description: A trivia party game with a high range of questions and multiple minigames along the way. Compete against friends or family, with up to 4 players locally! Prove you are the smartest noodle!

name: Maiden Cops
description: Maiden Cops is a Beat'm Up full of classic, arcade-style action and ass kicking. Choose among the gorgeous Maiden Cops policewomen, tackle crime in Maiden City and enjoy premium-level pixel art and a breathtaking soundtrack.

name: Mage and Monsters
description: Create an army and use spells while it fights for you. Mage & Monsters is a strategic battler, where you must choose wisely between upgrading the might of your army, or increasing the power of your spells.

name: Super Kenney
description: A relaxed and enjoyable platform jumping puzzle adventure game, come and complete the adventure with Kenney! ! !

name: Escape Academy: Deluxe Edition
description: Enjoy the expanded Escape Academy experience with the Escape Academy Deluxe Edition! Play over 20 masterfully hand-crafted Escape Rooms in this Deluxe Edition bundle. Includes: Escape Academy base game + Season Pass.

name: Hellpoint: Ultimate Edition
description: Hellpoint Ultimate Edition includes full game and Blue Sun DLC to reveal the complete story of Irid Novo, for those who can understand it. Get it for complete Hellpoint experience!

name: Beat Refle
description: This new take on rhythm games has you massage beautiful women in time to the music. The patrons of your massage parlor have not only sore bodies, but unique worries weighing on their hearts as well. Use your secret massage technique to clear all the stress out of their minds and bodies!

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Hotel of Tricks
Driving Quest
description: In Driving Quest you will rediscover the joy of driving! Explore a breathtaking environment and accomplish a variety of challenging & exciting missions!

name: Mini Subway: Logic on the Metro Line
description: Remember that the growth of the city is random, so each game will be unique! Mini Subway: Logic on the Metro Line is a game in which you will design the subway station network of a city. Trace different lines between stations and put all your trains i…

name: Faith & Shield: Tower Defense - Space Wars Game 2022
description: The remaining survivors realized that if they will continue like this, there would be no more of them as a species, so they decided to give all their efforts and create the last bastion of faith. Everything is not lost yet, but something unexpected comes…

name: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles: Tengen Uzui Character Pack
description: Tengen Uzui will become a playable character. Additional contents such as quotes and profile photos will also be included.

name: Dimensional Slaughter
description: Dimensional Slaughter is a very bloody fast-paced movement shooter with Rogue-Like Mechanics and a Retro Style. Explore Strange Dimensions, Move to collect Ammo, and Kill to Heal.

name: Azrael
description: Traverse this ominous 2D Dungeon Crawler as Azrael; A mysterious being. With three unique endings, the player is tasked to simply explore and watch as they learn more about their character, the situation, and consequences. Includes an original soundtrack and artwork.

name: Death Slave
description: Death Slave is a 2D puzzle-platformer where the player must intelligently kill their character in different ways to gain new powers to solve platforming challenges.

name: Angkor: Beginnings
description: Angkor: Beginnings is a highly re-playable fantasy Match 3 with modern design and aesthetics. The game tells the story of a family trapped on an island with an active volcano. The game also includes mini games and puzzles for variety and extra fun!

name: Passage
description: An extremely challenging horror game where you solve puzzles to escape while being hunted and toyed with by monstrosities.

name: Windsor
description: Windsor is a massively multiplayer strategy game. Look forward or backward in time as you plan your moves to bring your kingdom to victory

name: Asleep: Ato 1
description: Immersed in her nightmares, in a chaotic reality, confused and all alone. The only safe place is her room, but not forever... She wanders through an empty city and strange places while fleeing from creatures lurking in the darkness to find out what's going on. You are in the skin of Ana Lúcia.

name: Coastline
description: Coastline is a fast paced first person parkour game. With a heavy emphasis on platforming and a bit of soft core combat mixed in, Coastline is extremely engaging and rewards the best players who understand the depth of the abilities, combat encounters, and more!

name: A Pact With Me
description: Three humans summon Belial, a mischievous demon, to form a pact with. In exchange for granting their wishes, he would take their souls after 20 years. While assisting them, will Belial grow fond of these humans or corrupt them instead?

name: A Mirror Puzzle
description: "A Mirror Puzzle" is a puzzle game. Players will play as a water droplet spirit, through the use of various magic mirrors to control the symmetrical growth of plants or the position of certain scene elements change, overcome numerous difficulties, and finally reach the destination

name: Angry Bulls
description: Angry Bulls is a racing & action game that it is easy to control has thrill sense and has been getting hi-ranking and craze in players all over the world.The fun and anger effects added in the game play where Bull is Angry and out of control with having full of anger, avoid the obstacles such as horrible small fence and hell rings and to get gold and item by controlling rapidly the hi-speedy running was crazy to low down his anger by hitting animals come in his way, makes users have a good fun.

name: Mini Leap
description:
Mini is lost and all alone in the big city. Help Mini get home by collecting enough coins and dodging obstacles through various stages. Play in Challenge Mode or Endless Mode.
Hang tight, more fun stages are coming soon!

name: Haru Ichiban
description:
Haru Ichiban, in Japanese, means « The wind of Spring ».
In the Emperor’s gardens, spring slowly awakens nature. The carps, frogs and dragonflies warm up under the first rays of the sun.
Two apprentice gardeners are competing to see which one will earn the enviable duty of Imperial Gardener. They will show their skills and try to profit from this first wind of Spring to have the water lilies blossom in their color while making the most harmonious combinations !
The goal of the game is to make the water lilies blossom and move them using the breeze of the first wind of Spring, in order to form harmonious geometric figures (alignments or groupings of flowers of your color) worthing victory points.
Haru Ichiban has been designed by Bruno Cathala, a well-known french boardgame designer, who has still published more than 40 games.

name: Cataline
description: Blast your way through the embroidered world of Cataline!

name: Banana Kong 2
description:
Banana Kong 2 builds up on the original endless runner concept and adds entirely new challenges and ideas! Solve all-new missions, collect bananas and win golden Kong Coins to buy upgrades, hats and many other items in the crazy jungle shop! Become the King of the Jungle! While you dash through the jungle you'll be able to compete with your friends! Who will run the best distance? You can see your friends best results right in the game. Compare your records and unlock achievements while improving your playing style.

A highly dynamic game engine will provide endless fun in this never-ending run. Each session is a new challenge as the level is built randomly on the fly. Collect as many bananas as possible to fill your energy bar. Use a power-dash to destroy obstacles. Find secrets and unlock extras to get the most out of the game.

name: The Nova Era
description:
"The Nova Era" is a survival construction game with the theme of alien exploration.
The story takes place in the future, the earth's resources will be exhausted, and human beings have to find a new home. After long-term research by scientists, they finally found a planet suitable for human survival. This planet is Proxima b.
The radiation on Proxima b will have a bad effect on the human body, adults cannot survive under the radiation of Proxima b. However, scientists have found that children are not affected by the radiation. Players will play as a child who goes to explore Proxima b, and need to build fortifications and use powerful weapons to resist the attack of bugs and complete difficult tasks.

name: Zombie Shooting Star
description: You become a beautiful combatant Rudy. On the planet XX full of mutants and zombies. Defeat zombies and mutants, find and destroy Mutant Core before it regains power!

name: Keyboard Warrior: Dreamstate
description: Keyboard Warrior: Dreamstate is the world's first action-clicker game. Wield your mouse cursor as a weapon against hordes of oncoming enemies. Fight your way to the top using wit, creativity, and pure clicking strength.

name: War Pinball
description: From the creators of the legendary Pinball HD the amazing new War Pinball HD, developed in collaboration with MGM Studios. Three unique, war-themed pinball tables based on all-time Hollywood hits: "Platoon", "Navy SEALs" and "Missing in Action".

name: Dark Romance: Vampire Origins - Collector's Edition
description: When the dead return with a vengeance...

name: Romino's Adventure
description:
Make your way moving around tetrominoes in this puzzle platformer adventure. Travel through 8 unique worlds and a total of 43 levels to claim your rightfully deserved byte of the cake.

Will you be able to reach the end? I don't know, you can always check a walkthrough, it's cool with me. Also make sure to take breaks and hydrate from time to time. Ily bye.

name: MOAR: Appeteaser
description:
MOAR - Appeteaser is the sandbox version of Mayhem on a Rainbow - VR which will come in 2023 and is going to have an epic story campaign.
The Appeteser offers endless fun with wave and arena shooters spiced with mini games and an upcoming ingame level builder. Multiplayer is also among future plans.

You will fight a horde of various zombies with different kind of ranged and melee weapons.

You can collect points to unlock new guns, levels and power ups.

It is an easy going fun in which you can jump in any time and enjoy a bit of mayhem.

name: The Case of the Serialized Killer
description:
When a popular illustrator is found dead, disgraced demonologist Harold Ludicael is hired to summon her ghost. But he’s hiding a secret:

Ghosts are as fake as all the other lies coming out of Ludicael's mouth.

name: Carol the Dark Angel
description:
Carol The Dark Angel is an interactive comic book PlayStation game designed by Syufo Itahashi that takes place in Grillet City in the year 2018 where a boy that is a drug seller get involved into a war between the god hero called the Dark Angel and an evil cult. The first time that the boy and the Dark Angel meet is on a dark alley when he find 2 corpses and after that they meet again after the boy go out of the police station and get involved in a battle between the Dark Angel and a robot bug sent by the evil cult.

The gameplay is an interactive comic book in which the player can only see the next scene or the previous one, the game allows to use an autoplay mode and allow save anytime. The game features some interesting moving effects during the different scenes.

name: 2999 Game Kids
description:
2999 Game Kids is an interactive comic in which you control a character in the future. The game takes place in the year 2999 and the people are some kind of cyborgs. The game start when the player's character (a young kid) wakes up from big nightmare and some strange things starts to happen to him.

The gameplay is the usual in the comic interactive but in this game there some parts of the game in which you control the character in a 3d graphics engine with a first person perspective.

name: Inoue Takehiko: Buzzer Beater - Zenpen
description: Inoue Takehiko: Buzzer Beater is an interactive comic book in which the player can only see the next scene or the previous one, the game allows to use an autoplay mode and allow save anytime. The game features some interesting moving effects during the different scenes.

name: Inoue Takehiko: Buzzer Beater - Kouhen
description: "Inoue Takehiko: Buzzer Beater" is an interactive comic book in which the player can only see the next scene or the previous one, the game allows to use an autoplay mode and allow save anytime. The game features some interesting moving effects during the different scenes.

name: Space Adventure Cobra: The Psychogun Vol. 1
Space Adventure Cobra: The Psychogun Vol. 2
I am Fish
description: A metroidvania-RPG developed by Taro Kudo and Kazuyuki Kurashima, former Love-de-Lic developers who worked on such titles as moon and Super Mario RPG, exclusively for the DoCoMo i-Mode service.

name: Rune Teller
description: Become a powerful Rune Teller traveling through the open world of the Runegea. Recruit great colleagues for a fun journey, craft through a variety of items, and solve the requests of the Runegea residents. At the end of a long journey, you will find the reason for your resurrection.

name: Stygian Flowers
description:
Stygian Flowers is a puzzle RPG about someone combing through the underworld to drag back her friend. The afterlife’s a big place, but luckily, some of its residents don’t mind helping out.

In a land like this, enemies are a given. Slowly expand your skillset to defeat tough opponents; there are no levels, no grinding, and no random encounters, so the only way to win is to cobble together a solid plan.

Well, a little luck can’t hurt too.

name: Touhou Mystia's Izakaya DLC1 Pack: Forest of Magic & Youkai Mountain
description: This DLC is Touhou Mystia’s Izakaya’s expansion DLC.

name: 8-BIT Yu-No's Great Adventure
description: A side-scrolling action game developed by Platine Dispotif and MAGES for the nintendo Switch, 8-bit Yu-no's Great adventure is a spinoff of Yu-No A girl that chants love at the bounds of this world released alongside it's 2019 remake for the Nintendo Switch. Playing as Yu-No, the game adapts the Adapts the ADaMS system from the visual novel allowing for the player to rewind the game to follow different routes in order to attain key items to reach the final stage and boss.

name: Reading Recipes: Grandma Ollie's Morphabet Soup
Reader Rabbit's Math Ages 6-9
description:
Reader Rabbit joins his pal Sam the Lion who has entered his dilapidated sailboat in a boat race when a tremendous storm ensues, shipwrecking them on Pirate Island with their boat in pieces. There they meet Penelope the Parrot who encourages Sam and Reader to build a new boat.

Play as Reader Rabbit as he solves math puzzles to collect Boat Pieces, but watch out! The Pirats will do anything to stop Sam and Reader.

name: Spellbook Demonslayers
description:
Spellbook Demonslayers is a roguelite horde survival game inspired by Vampire Survivors and Path of Exile.

Slay thousands of demons with powerful magic to protect the Cosmic Library! Choose new spells and upgrades every run to create overpowered builds with each character, and steal the powers of defeated enemies to destroy the demonic horde.

name: Quest for Saddam
description: In Quest for Saddam, your mission is to find and capture Saddam Hussein. As a highly trained, special forces soldier, you're armed with an arsenal of weapons and a coalition of comical characters. Battles take you across Iraq, fighting hordes of Iraqi soldiers in your ultimate quest, Saddam Hussein.

name: Pure Pinball: American Pinball Reborn
description: The Xbox version of Pure Pinball contains all the content of the original with enhanced visuals and audio, as well as one extra table with an outer space theme. High scores can be shared over Xbox Live.

name: G.H.O.S.T. Hunters: The Haunting of Majesty Manor
Touhou Mystia's Izakaya DLC 2 Pack: Former Hell & Chireiden
description: Second expansion pack DLC for Touhou Mystia’s Izakaya’s

name: Go Fish! The Pop n' Drop Game
Furius Legacy
description: Furius Legacy is an MMORPG based on blockchain. An entire metaverse with plenty of magic creatures. You can earn and sell your gold ($FLG). It is a world where you can gather friends, create guilds, raise your character and fight in pvp and ESports Battle.

name: MeetLight and the Secrets of the Universe
description: MeetLight is an indie RPG, with crafting, farming, building, and a unique spiritual story. Run your forge by day, take care of your farm and trade with the villagers then explore the energetical worlds and meet their inhabitants at night!

name: Egnaro
description: Egnaro is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Yuzuka.

name: (O_O)
description: (O_O) is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame created by Kontena in RPG Maker 2000. You take the role of Suzutsuki, as she explores her dream worlds. Along the way, you can collect effects that alter her emotions.

name: Any.One Online
description:
Any.One Online is an English Yume Nikki fangame developed as an entry for Dream Diary Jam 6. The goal of the game is to explore and collect Costumes. There are also tokens that can be found throughout the virtual world.

When you were still in high school, the only social MMO you ever consistently played was Any.One Online. With new virtual reality tech and user-created worlds, you and your friends used to spend hours exploring, dressing up your avatars, and meeting new people in the strange digital environment. But that was years ago: even though the servers are still running, Any.One Online is practically a virtual ghost town. For nostalgia's sake, however, you decide to log back in. What you find is a surreal landscape only barely related to what you remember, a decade’s worth of unsupported code, scattered costumes, and the looming feeling that something's not right…

name: Cold
description: An English Yume Nikki fangame developed as an entry for Dream Diary Jam 6. You play as Aruben who wakes up in a strange place, surviving and exploring his Cold dreams.

name: Great Battles of the American Civil War
Bolt Bot Screwy Viruses
description: Take control of a robot named Bolt in over 50 levels of 3D platforming fun inspired by 90's and early 2000's classic platform games. It is a collect-a-thon at heart and rewards the player constantly in an evolving hub world!

name: Her Name Was Fire
description: Her Name Was Fire is a Tarotpunk twin stick roguelike with deck building elements where you progressively unlock spells and upgrades to defeat hordes of void creatures. Survive the 5 stages of grief and vanquish the Major Allegories.

name: Tatakae! Pro Yakyuu Twin League
description: Tatakae! Pro Yakyuu Twin League is an NPB baseball game for the Sega Game Gear. It features all of the teams in the Central and Pacific Leagues of NPB in 1995 and features several game modes.

name: Giftscop
description: Giftscop is a fan-made recreation of the fictional game Petscop from the web series of the same name.

name: Gus Goes to Cyberopolis
description:
Gus Goes to Cyberopolis is an educational game for children between three and eight. The player can explore six locations and trigger animations by clicking on items on screen. Gus' three buddies are hiding in each screen and speak/sing to the player when found. Each location additionally has an activity:

Subway: the player has to recycle a number of items by dragging them on the correct bin (aluminium, plastic, paper or glass).

Post Office: the player has to complete a partially written letter by dragging icons on the blank parts. There are no right or wrong choices.

Science Dome: creating a soil aquarium by choosing the container, gravel, dirt, plants and critters. This is a freeform activity without a set goal.

Aquarium: a concentration variant with sea animals.

Library: after spinning the globe, the player can click on a visible continent. Then a short factoid about a local animal is shown.

Gus's Diner: The diner is located in six countries (USA, France, Germany, Spain, Italy and Japan) which can be changed by clicking on the flag. Clicking on any item gives its name in the local language. In the background are also local photographs which can be changed by clicking on them.

name: Gus Goes to CyberStone Park
description:
Gus Goes to Cyberstone Park is an educational game for children between three and eight. The player can explore five locations and trigger animations by clicking on items on screen. Gus' three buddies are hiding in each screen and speak/sing to the player when found. Each location additionally has an activity:

Trees: The player has to navigate Gus through a top-down maze.
Mountains: The player has to solve equations (addition and subtraction) in four difficulty levels. On the easiest level, the nine digits have to be clicked on in the correct order.
Lake: Sorting animals into their correct habitat (earth, forest or water)
River: Animals float on the river and each of them holds a sign with a letter. The player has to click on the starting letter of the given word. There are four difficulty levels.
Camp: The player is given an incomplete campfire story and has to complete them by dragging icons on the blank spaces. There are no right or wrong choices.

name: Gus Goes to Kooky Carnival
description:
Gus Goes to the Kooky Carnival is an educational game for children between three and eight. The player can explore six locations and trigger animations by clicking on items on screen. Gus' three buddies are hiding in each screen and speak to the player when found. Each location except the Ferris wheel additionally has an activity:

Trailer: There is a map of the United States to America to find. By clicking on a state, the player learns a fact about the state.
Animal Lounge: A card game with similarities to Concentration / Memory variants. Each of the two players have matching cards except one which is only present once. Each player chooses one of the other players' cards in turns and has to match them to one of their own cards. If they match, the cards are removed from play. If It is the single card, the choosing players has to take it into their own deck. It is not possible to click on the wrong card while matching. The player who has the single card in their possession when all other cards are gone loses the match.
Side Show: The player can choose various facial features and clothing to create a face.
Midway: A shooting range where letters flow into and out of view. The player chooses a letter by clicking on it. Depending on the difficulty level, the goal is to either find a single letter, spell a given word or spell as many words as possible (the next viable word is presented by a icon) within a time limit.

name: 2 Game Pack I Hallowed Legends: Samhain & Hallowed Legends: Templar
Cult of Babel
description: Roguelite Overpowered Wizard Simulator. Slay hundreds of cultists using the power of ancient cards and your magical steampunk arsenal. Choose from a diverse set of cards to create unique, game-breaking builds and shoot down the horde trying to stop you from climbing the tower of babel.

name: Horse-o-Chess
description: An autobattle strategy game where the player manages resources and spends them to put together teams of units that fight automatically. The player must survive every wave in a mission to win.

name: Rebound
description: Rebound is a game about about relaxing and cleaning books.

name: Toad In the Hole
description:
A short and silly platformer, made to learn some of GB Studio 3's new features!

Play as a foolish toad. Very short, a few endings, all original music by Louie Zong.

name: Pokémon: Eclat Pourpre
description: A Pokémon fan game, a hack rom with a brand new story, new badges and new mechanics in the GBA artwork.

name: The Aftermath
description: You, the player, are a purgatory Intern who has to take of all the paperwork the day after Everybody Died. By reading through each person's personal info sheet, you must judge whether they deserve to go to Heaven or to go to Hell.

name: Trek to Yomi: Ultimate Edition
description: Trek to Yomi is an ultra-stylized cinematic action adventure that follows the enthralling story of Hiroki during his fall against the forces of evil. Experience his heroic return to make good on his failed promise to save the people he swore to protect.

name: Jeff Logar
description: The game tells the story of Jeff Logar and his daughters Tahoma and Sahale. Both girls run away after heavy row with their brutish father Jeff. They got lost in the dark forests of Seattle (USA). There, Jeff will undergo a lifechanging transformation to save his daughters.

name: God of War Ragnarök: Collector's Edition
description:
God of War: Ragnarök is the ninth instalment in the God of War series and the sequel to 2018's God of War. Continuing with the Norse mythology theme, the game is set in ancient Norway and features series protagonists Kratos, the former Greek God of War, and his young son Atreus. The game kicked off the events of Ragnarök, where Kratos and Atreus must journey to each of the Nine Realms in search of answers as they prepare for the prophesied battle that will end the world.

The Collector's Edition includes:
- Full game
- Kratos Darkdale Armo DLC
- Atreus Darkdale Attire DLC
- Darkdale Blades Handles for the Blades of Chaos DLC
- Darkdale Axe Grip for the Leviathan Axe DLC
- Avatar Set DLC
- Dark Horse Digital Mini Artbook DLC
- Official God of War Ragnarök Digital Soundtrack DLC (while supplies last).
- Steelbook
- 2” Vanir Twins Carvings
- Dwarven Dice Set
- 16” Mjölnir Replica
- PlayStation 4 Theme DLC

name: God of War Ragnarök: Jötnar Edition
description:
God of War: Ragnarök is the ninth instalment in the God of War series and the sequel to 2018's God of War. Continuing with the Norse mythology theme, the game is set in ancient Norway and features series protagonists Kratos, the former Greek God of War, and his young son Atreus. The game kicked off the events of Ragnarök, where Kratos and Atreus must journey to each of the Nine Realms in search of answers as they prepare for the prophesied battle that will end the world.

The Jötnar Edition includes:

- Full game
- Kratos Darkdale Armo DLC
- Atreus Darkdale Attire DLC
- Darkdale Blades Handles for the Blades of Chaos DLC
- Darkdale Axe Grip for the Leviathan Axe DLC
- Avatar Set DLC
-Dark Horse Digital Mini Artbook DLC
- Official God of War Ragnarök Digital Soundtrack DLC,
- 7-Inch vinyl record with music by Bear McCrear
- The Draupnir Ring
- Brok’s Dice Set
- Yggdrasil Cloth Map
- Steelbook
- 2” Vanir Twins Carvings
- 16” Mjölnir Replica
- PlayStation 4 Theme DLC

name: God of War Ragnarök: Launch Edition
description:
God of War: Ragnarök is the ninth instalment in the God of War series and the sequel to 2018's God of War. Continuing with the Norse mythology theme, the game is set in ancient Norway and features series protagonists Kratos, the former Greek God of War, and his young son Atreus. The game kicked off the events of Ragnarök, where Kratos and Atreus must journey to each of the Nine Realms in search of answers as they prepare for the prophesied battle that will end the world.

The Launch Edition includes:
- PS4 game (physical)
- Kratos Risen Snow armor
- Atreus Risen Snow tunic

name: Neo Monstrum: Origins
description: Neo Monstrum - Origins is a fully voiced, interactive mystery visual novel that steps into the origins of our main character, Neo.

name: Asterix & Obelix XXXL: The Ram From Hibernia - Day One Edition
description: Join Asterix & Obelix in a brand-new original story in… Hibernia! Explore this crazy action-adventure in a local coop mode up to 4 players !

name: FIFA 23: Ultimate Edition
description: Kick off your season with a boost! FIFA 23 Ultimate Edition includes Xbox One & Xbox Series X|S games plus 4600 FIFA Points.

name: Utaho no Tatari 2
description: You wish for the complete truth. You are about to touch the curse again. On that fateful day, a few years after that incident, she was about to become a new victim. Afterall, her ordinary life is about to break. Search for the cursed truth. Learn everything. I can't help you anymore. You will die.

name: The Land Before Time
description:
There's a rumbling at your feet. Is it a vicious T-Rex? Maybe it's an erupting volcano! No time to panic. Littlefoot, Cera, Spike, Ducky and Petrie need you! Your friends are trapped in the Mysterious Beyond and it's up to your to get them back to the safety of The Great Valley. Predators are lurking everywhere. The terrain is treacherous. Teamwork is the key. It's an amazing adventure that takes you through The Land Before Time!

The Land Before Time is a 2D platforming game developed by Eclipse Entertainment for the Game Boy Color. It was first released in Europe in June 2001, with a North American release the following month, both published by Conspiracy Entertainment. The game received mostly lower reviews, earning a 40% average from aggregate review website GameRankings.

name: Kohan: Immortal Sovereigns Special Awards Edition
description:
The first game in the Kohan series packaged in a new Game of the Year edition. The GOTY edition comes with 12 new maps, 13 brand new heroes, 16 new computer strategies, and an improved computer A.I.

The game is set in a fantasy world where you take on the role of an immortal known as the Kohan. Your race once ruled the world, but was devastated in a series of cataclysms. As an immortal you have reawakened to a new world, unlike the one you once knew. If you are to return your race to their rightful glory you must solve the mystery of their destruction.

name: Digimon Survive: Month 1 Edition
description:
Digimon Survive presents a hybrid visual novel and tactical RPG set in a mysterious world filled with dangerous monsters and deadly battles that will test your ability to survive.

After getting lost on a school trip, Takuma Momozuka finds himself transported to a world inhabited by ferocious foes and new allies. Join Takuma and his friends as they fight their way back home. Craft your story in this thrilling visual novel with turn-based combat.

name: Ghost Scramble
description: A action game from XFLAG Development in Japan

name: Kelly Club: Pet Parade
description:
Hang out with Kelly, Keeya, Chelsie, and Tommy as they choose outfits and decorate floats.
Groom your pets, teach them fun new tricks, and play fun arcade games in between preparations
Watch the parade come to life as the crowd cheers for your posh pets
Print out images of your perfect pet to share with others

name: Fell Seal: Arbiter's Mark - Deluxe Edition
description: Fell Seal: Arbiter’s Markis is set in the fantastical world of Teora, which was torn asunder centuries ago. The world has mostly recovered under the guidance of the ruling Immortal Council, yet it is still fraught with danger. As Kyrie, an Arbiter serving the Council, you’ll be tasked with protecting the land’s people from these dangers. However, a darker current runs beneath the surface — Kyrie discovers the corruption festering within her own order and comes to question the motives of Teora’s would-be protectors.

name: Touhou Genso Wanderer Reloaded: Elegance Edition
description: This bundle includes Genso Wanderer -Reloaded- and all additional DLC.

name: Farming Simulator 22: Platinum Expansion
description: Expand your farming business to the brand-new and lively environment of Silverrun Forest - and bring your new machines and tools by Volvo and others to the woods! Included in the huge expansion is a new map, inspired by the Pacific Northwest with its woody landscapes - rife with points of interest and production chains that develop based on your delivery of logs. Grab your tree markers to take on new forestry missions and build boats at the dock!

name: Pufu's Spiral: Adventures Around the World
Microsoft Train Simulator: Pro Train II
description: This complete add-on pack for Microsoft Train Simulator includes hundreds of new miles of track through East Germany.

name: Microsoft Train Simulator: Pro Train
description: One of the first commercial add-ons for Microsoft Train Simulator, ProTrain takes you to one of the most beautiful areas in Germany, the scenic Rhine Valley region. Within the deep valley of the Rhine, ride alongside the wide river displaying towns, cities, castles and the spectacular Koln cathedral. Riding in several new trains, you will ride past the cities of Cologne, Bonn, Mainz, Koblenz, Wiesbaden and Frankfurt.

name: Heroes of Might and Magic II: The Succession Wars
description:
Heroes of Might and Magic II is a Game Boy Color game created using content from Heroes of Might and Magic I, II, and III.

Most of the game's graphics are converted from Heroes of Might and Magic III, while gameplay is a mix of the three games. The campaign centers around a dragon slayer quest.

Within the game, there are four playable factions: Castle, Rampart, Fortress and Stronghold. There are a total of 40 heroes and 28 faction based creatures and 4 neutral creatures.

name: Professor Iris' Fun Field Trip: Seaside Adventure
Hello Kitty: Bubblegum Girlfriends
description: Hello Kitty: Bubblegum Girlfriends is a series of 8 minigames featuring Hello Kitty and her friends.

name: Hello Kitty: Dream Carnival
description: Hello Kitty Dream Carnival allows the player to partake in 8 different games and activities that involve Hello Kitty and her friends.

name: Pro Bass Fishing
description: Its a game about fishing published by the makers of D!Zone, Perdition's Gate, Duke It Out In D.C, and many more well remembered video games.

name: Princess Lillifee's Magic Fairy
description: Who does not know Princess Lillifee? The sweet little princess who lives in a fairy-tale castle with a wonderful garden around it. From morning to night, Lillifee takes care of all the animals and plants that live there. She wants to be a good friend to everyone and helps them with their questions or problems. With this first Lillifee NDS game, girls of 4 step into the magical dream world of Princess Lillifee, of which they themselves always dream! Dance with Lillifee, fly with her through various fairy-tale locations. Create magic-like paintings or play magic mini-games with Lillifee. Princess Lillifee wishes all players as much happiness in life as there are stars in the sky. This Nintendo DS is aimed perfectly at the target audience of Nintendo DS players. The games can be played on both screens, with very simple touch pen navigation and voice recognition, so that the smallest girls who cannot yet read can also play this magical game. Characteristics: Dance along with Lillifee Make Princess Lilliffee beautiful with makeup and beautiful dresses Make magic paintings Awaken beautiful butterflies Play magic mini-games, such as find-the-pearls, find the match

name: Prince of Persia Collection: Limited Edition
description:
This collection includes:
- Prince of Persia
- Prince of Persia 2: The Shadow & The Flame
- A video about the making of Prince of Persia 3D

name: Fritz & Chesster: Learn to Play Chess Vol. 1
description: Learn to think strategically, try out tricky mental exercises and master fun and exciting challenges – all with a generous helping of chess knowledge. These things and more await you on this unusual chess adventure that has already received great international acclaim.

name: Professor Iris' Fun Field Trip: Animal Safari
Herohero-kun
description: Herohero-kun is a role-playing game for Game Boy Color released by Imagineer in 2001. It is based on the manga "Herohero-kun," but the main character is not Herohero but the original game's main character. The main character's name can be up to four characters, and the gender can also be selected. The purpose is to rescue the townspeople of Ukiuki who were put to sleep by Suyasuya.

name: Professor Wise and His X-Ray Eyes
Holiday Lemmings
description: Not to be confused with the 1993 release of the same name, this 1994 release comes with 32 new levels and updated music.

name: MonsterReaver
description: MonsterReaver is a multiplayer game where you place stones to take your opponents stones.

name: Kloa: Child of the Forest
description: Consumed by a mysterious curse, restore a once lush forest and its inhabitants to their natural state in this action adventure tale. Experience fast-paced combat, puzzles, and the beauty of nature captured in handcrafted pixel art.

name: The Football T
description: Dribble the ball to become the best football player in the world.

name: The Lord of the Rings: Heroes of Middle Earth
description:
A new adventure is brewing in The Lord of the Rings: Heroes of Middle-earth!

Soon you will be able to seize the power of the New Ring and rewrite history. Good or evil - the choice will be yours…

name: Kids on Site: Hard Hat Edition
description: In Kids On Site: Hard Hat Edition, you will be able to take the controls of the excavator, bulldozer, steamroller, and the wrecking ball. Your goal is to complete all of the objectives at each construction site in order to earn your merit badge.

name: Prank'd: Prank Your Way Around the World
X-Men Origins: Wolverine
description: The PSP version of the adaptation of the movie X-Men Origins: Wolverine.

name: X-Men Origins: Wolverine - The Mobile Game
description: The mobile phone version of the adaptation of the movie X-Men Origins: Wolverine

name: Forklift Man
description: You are Forklift Man! He can rapidly grow his limbs at his will. His amazing superpower must be put to good use among various challenges and puzzles.

name: Mini Mini Farm
description: In Mini Mini Farm you must collect resources in order to make your way through an inhospitable island, making money and building structures for your survival

name: Hyper Cards
description:
If you are obsessed with collecting all the cards, then Hyper Cards is the perfect game for you.
Rip out the cards from their packs and see which character is hidden in it!
You can trade your cards with other to complete your pack but be careful… you don’t want to be scammed by your competition!

name: TinyArmored
description: Progress through various land and defeat all enemies that are in your way. Collect resource, upgrade and customize your vehicle like you want.

name: Garbageboi+
description: As a Garbageboi, you clean the streets while avoiding insane traffic and the deadly stares from the people living there.

name: Shinseiki Evangelion: Typing Hokan Keikaku
description: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Typing Hokan Keikaku, is a game for the Sega Dreamcast which uses the Dreamcast Keyboard. Its gameplay resembles the likes of The Typing of the Dead.

name: Character Sheets, Please
description:
A silly parody of "Papers, Please", where you're playing as a Game Master and have to review your players' character sheets. Confront the rulebook (with increasing number of rules) with information on the sheet and try to spot any mistkaes... mistakes... oops.

How to play: Check your rulebook (on the left) with character sheet (on the right) and spot any inconsistencies. Click on an incorrect element and reject the character sheet or approve it if everything seems to be in order.

name: Secret Tea Garden
description:
Every customer desires their own blend of tea and it's your job to brew and deliver! All the while avoiding hazards and keeping an eye on the time!

Everyone you serve has a uniquely generated appearance, you can even customise how you look by using your copy ability!

name: Stellar Nexus
description: The heart of the nexus was taken apart. Explore the cosmos to retrieve the five pieces and bring them together at the core. Gather resources to upgrade your ship, and watch out for enemies, monsters, asteroids and space whales!

name: Taolu
description: Becoming a kung fu master has never been that much fun! In Taolu you can train your martial arts skills respecting the essence of the real kung fu, expanded with the wonder of a VR game. Master curated sets of choreographed movements using a realistic wooden dummy.

name: Tonsil Terror
description: You can only see when you scream. Find the 8 hidden candies. The ghosts don't like it when you scream.

name: SRG Mixtape Volume #1
description: Super Rare Mixtape Vol. 1 is a physical indie game collection including 30 games and 6 demos. Packaged as a USB drive shaped like cassette tape with only a limited number sold.

name: Taiyou no Otsuge
description: Taiyou no Otsuge is a tarot game in which the player provides the data and the game make a tarot diagnosis about love, study, work, health, luck, etc. The game features also some mini games.

name: Quadrobat
description: Quadrobat is a precision platformer with unique movement. Using a grapple you can swing through the world with speed and momentum.

name: Container City
description: Build eco-friendly habitats on the sea out of containers and solar panels. Welcome to the city of the future!

name: Touhou Genso Wanderer Reloaded: Complete Edition
description: This bundle includes Genso Wanderer -Reloaded-, all DLC, and limited edition bonus items.

name: Pop'n Pop
description: Pop'n Pop is a puzzle game similar to Puzzle Bobble; the player's goal is to release colored bubbles from the bottom on the screen within a limited amount of time, trying to match three or more bubbles of the same color. The difference in this version is that bubbles cannot bounce on the walls; the player can only release them vertically. The game features characters from various Taito games, such as Bub and Bob from the Bubble Bobble series, Tiki from The New Zealand Story, the dwarves from Doko Doko Don, and others.

name: Mister Twister
description: Play like a tornado and try to get everything in your way! You can take everything from an apple to a house with you if you just get big enough!

name: Pinball Deluxe
description: A pinball game for Nintendo DS by Anuman Interactive, only released in Europe.

name: Picture Puzzle Collection: The Dutch Masters
Touhou Genso Wanderer Lotus Labyrinth R: Complete Edition
description: This bundle includes Touhou Genso Wanderer -Lotus Labyrinth R- with all DLC and special digital bonuses.

name: Planet G
description: Planet G is a puzzle game in which you must find recipes and discover fruits by combining them.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Season 2 - Rival Escalation
description: Rivals are setting up new communications equipment, which must be shut down! In the all-new rival signal Season Event, you must interrupt the operation of the Rival Communications Router, hack its Antenna Nodes and shut it down before the timer runs out and the entire thing discharges a lethal energy blast! Timing and precision will be of the essence if you want to obtain the Data Cell stored inside the Router!

name: Spider-Man: Shattered Dimensions
description: Spider-Man: Shattered Dimensions is a thrilling action-packed adventure set in four dramatically different universes from legendary Spider-Man lore, each with a distinct Spider-Man armed with unique skills and strengths, in one original storyline. Players will be transported to new locations never before seen in a Spider-Man game, from lush jungles and dusty deserts to various urban terrains. Acclaimed comic book writer Dan Slott takes players on a mission to contain the magical energy of the Tablet of Order and Chaos, which has been shattered and sent hurtling across parallel universes, and battle fan-favorite villains in a quest to restore the fabric of reality.

name: Spider-Man: Web of Shadows
description:
Spider-Man: Web of Shadows gives Spider-Man the powers of both the classic red suit and the newer black suit. As he progresses deeper into the game, players must decide which suit to rely on - the agility and quickness of the red suit, or the sheer power of the black suit. As Spider-Man defeats enemies, he'll unlock new abilities, web moves, and suit upgrades, including the ability to call in other Marvel characters as allies, such as Nightcrawler and Green Goblin.

The game's sidescrolling action lets players explore the expansive, symbiote-corrupted New York at their own pace. Abilities unlocked in the game let players explore deeper into the city, allowing Spider-Man to traverse symbiotic sludge and blast through ichor-filled tunnels, as well as defeat the increasingly-dangerous infected denizens.

name: Spider-Man: Web of Shadows
description: The Wii port of the Spider-Man: Web of Shadows. It is a full-3D action game based on the version for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 3, Wii, and Xbox 360.

name: All of Touhou Mystia's Izakaya
description: This bundle includes all the works related to the Touhou Mystia's Izakaya series.

name: Weaver
description: A daily word game, based on Lewis Carroll's word ladder. Players must change one word into another valid word, one letter at a time, until they have made the target word.

name: PGA Tour Pro: Classic Courses Volume 1
PGA Tour 96: Wentworth
description: An add-on course for PGA Tour 96. It adds the Wentworth Club course located in Surrey, UK.

name: PGA Tour 96 TPC at Sawgrass Championship Course
description: A course add-on for PGA Tour 96. It adds the Tournament Players Club at Sawgrass, located in Ponte Vedra Beach, Florida: home of the PGA as well as the location of the annual The Players Championship.

name: PGA European Tour Golf
description: Game Boy port of PGA European Tour.

name: Jig-a-Pix Pets
description: Can you be the first to complete the puzzle in Jigapix Pets? Solve one of the 40 unlocked puzzles, or unlock 40 additional ones in Time Challenge mode. Challenge a friend in a head-to-head race to be the first to complete a jigsaw puzzle. Take a photo using the camera in your Nintendo DSi system and create your own unique puzzle to expand the fun. Jigapix Pets features 80 images of some of your favorite furry and cuddly creatures like cats, dogs, rabbits, horses and more.

name: Jig-a-Pix Wonderful World
description: In Jigapix: Wonderful World jigsaw puzzle fans take on the addictive challenge of solving 80 landscape puzzles created from picturesque and iconic images sampled from around the world. Puzzles images included in the game come from eight different regions, as well as eight different sizes, making piecing images together more and more challenging as familiarity with regions fade and the dimensions of puzzles change. Players can solve the puzzles alone or with a friend via a wireless connection, and for those needing an occasional break from jigsaw play, there are three additional mini-games included in the game. Finally, DSi owners can take the game to a whole new level as they are able to snap photos and create their own personalized jigsaw puzzles out of the imported images.

name: Petz Puppyz and Kittenz
description: Care for and love the most adorable puppy and kitten duo as you help them grow and become best friends.

name: Jewel Quest: Heritage
description: Play the latest and greatest Jewel Quest game for FREE today.iWin's ultra popular match-3 series is back with Jewel Quest Heritage! Solve over 175 Jewel Quest Heritage boards and one puzzling family mystery on a topsy-turvy quest through Europe's ancient hot spots. Hit the trail with Rupert on a journey through the shrines and castles of Hernan Cortes' lore. Swap jewels and collect puzzle pieces to unravel a perplexing web of Jewel Quest family history. With over 175 new Jewel Quest Heritage boards, including 3 jewel-swapping modes, new surprises await in every level.• 35 stunning around-the-world scenes• Over 175 unique Jewel Quest boards, each with its own challenges• 3 modes of play in Jewel Quest Heritage• Puzzle pieces and a family tree, with new portraits unlocked as you progress• The suspense and intrigue Jewel Quest fans have come to expect• Double the gameplay with an all new Expert Mode, unlocked after the mystery is solved

name: Jewel Craft
description: Swap beautiful jewels and break them for new jewels! This match-3 game is ready to give you tremendous experience of speed and tension. Take this spacecraft and challenge the highest score ever!

name: Petz Horseshoe Ranch
description: Learn how to take care of your very own family of horses!

name: Petz Hamsterz Bunch
description: Raise, care and play with a family of hamsters on the PSP! Adopt a hamster and customize your pet's look with tons of fun types and colors. Keep them occupied and watch them grow as you become the proud parent of hamsters.

name: Jumanji: A Jungle Adventure Game Pack
Junior Brain Trainer 2
description: Junior Brain Trainer 2 is designed to put young minds to the test and improve memory, spelling, reading, logic and problem solving skills.

name: The Journeyman Project: Pegasus Prime
description: Originally announced as a "Director's Cut", It was released solely for the Power Macintosh by Bandai Digital Entertainment in North America. It contained a 4 disk set which required disk swapping during gameplay. There were plans to port the game to the PlayStation (with publisher Acclaim Entertainment) and Sega Saturn in the U.S., but these versions were never released. As a result, original disks of the Mac-only game have been very rare to find.

name: Proffessional Bull Riding: Out of the Chute
Payne Stewart Golf
description:
Payne Stewart Pro Golf is an unreleased golf game for the Sega Mega Drive set to be published by Time Warner Interactive.
The game demoed at Winter CES 1995 with a tenative Spring 1995 release date. The project was cancelled for unknown reasons.
Two prototypes were released by Hidden Palace on January 1, 2022.

name: Flyff Universe
description:
Flyff Universe is a enhanced old school MMORPG remake built on modern technology.

All of the biggest and most popular aspects of each version of Flyff have been merged into one, bringing you your very own Flyff Universe.
Experience Flyff like never before, with an all-new graphics engine. Many options are now available: Antialiasing, Post-Processing, Advanced Shaders, and more.

name: Noah's Ark
description: Noah's Ark Deluxe, a really nice puzzle game sold in 2002 for Windows, is available and ready to be played again! Time to play a real-time, falling block puzzle and tile matching puzzle video game title.

name: Iron John Hawk: The Shards Of Power
Ni-Hao Kai-Lan: Kai-Lan's Great trip to China!
Final Fantasy: Blackmoon Prophecy
description: This is a Final Fantasy fangame that is meant to emulate the first six entries of the series. Aside from just being a fangame, Blackmoon Prophecy is also a tribute to Final Fantasy in the sense that the developer tried to put together many of the things he loved about playing RPGs growing up into this game. It's a love letter to retro gaming and our childhoods.

name: Final Fantasy: Blackmoon Prophecy II
description: One hundred years after the events of Blackmoon Prophecy, the world of Gaia has recovered from the conflict with Emperor Belmont, Malacore, and Zeul which saw a group of adventurers, today known as the Light Warriors, save the world from certain doom.

name: Nickelodeon Nick O Matic Design Factory
Influence
description:
Make an Influence with your every move...

In this game, the player will be given a power called "Influence" to clear all the cubes that are piled up on the stage.

name: NHRA Drag Racing: Quarter Mile Showdown
NHRA Drag Racing: Pro Stock Cars & Trucks
Neverwinter Nights: Gold Edition
description:
This Edition contains the original award winning Neverwinter Nights, with the latest updates and patches, as well as the first expansion pack, Neverwinter Nights: Shadows of Undrentide.
The package also contains a couple of "mini-adventures", created by Bioware's employees. "The Winds of Eremor" and "The Dark Ranger's Treasure" are mods by Rob Bartel, and "The Heir is Human" was created by Dan Whiteside.

name: Nerf Jr. Foam Balster: Attack of The Kleptons
Margrave Manor 3: The Curse of the Blacksmith's Heart
Margot's Bepuzzled
description: Join the lovable Margot as she returns in an all-new puzzling game to challenge you on the Nintendo DS. Play over 1,000 puzzling games including crossword, word search, sudoku, and more!

name: Isla Dorada: Episode 1 - The Sands of Ephranis
Hydrophobia
description:
In Hydrophobia the player takes the role of engineer Kate Wilson who works on the cruise ship Queen of the World. Unfortunately terrorists took over and placed bombs all over the ship and after detonating them chaos breaks loose. Now Kate has to fight for her life.

In this environment water plays an important role and it emphasizes realistic water representation. Water is the main component in many of the game's puzzles in which Kate uses her kinetic powers, gained in the second half. Other puzzles involve using an universal device to hack security installations (as a mini-game) or find out codes to open doors. Those are written in an invisible font on walls and have to made visible with her tool. The rest of the game consists of climbing sections and shoot outs with terrorists. Here the game uses a traditional cover system and five ammo types.

name: Pokémon AlteRed
description: A romhack of Pokémon FireRed that adds all new forms, updated areas, and new quality of life features.

name: ICarly: Isock it to 'Em
description: Spencer's creating a gigantic sock sculpture for his buddy Socko and needs - yep, you got it - socks! Join Carly and friends on her web Telethon to help get crazy, fun acts onstage to perform. The more points received, the more socks get donated, and the bigger a success Spencer's sock sculpture will be! Can Freddie keep his camera in focus? Can you keep Spencer and Sam out of trouble at the judges' table? Hurry! You have just 28 hours to collect enough socks in iCarly iSock it to 'Em!

name: Soccer Rally
description:
Soccer Rally is intense car football action on mobile, with a dose of tactics and strategy.
Unlock skills and cars to get ahead of the pack. To get good you will need timing, defense and striking.

name: Halloween Candy Break Head to Head
description: Halloween Candy Break Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment.

name: Christmas Break
description: Christmas Break is an arcade game that lets the user break Xmas bricks with a unique Christmas paddle and ball.

name: Nara: Facing Fire
description: In a world where a mysterious energy known as Va flows through and connects all living beings, a child with the power to command this energy was born. As the last of her kind, young Nara must unravel the dark secrets of her power and face the flames and shadows that took someone special from her.

name: Infamous: Second Son - Cole's Legacy
description:
Cole's Legacy is an expansion pack for Infamous: Second Son which was initially available only by pre-ordering the game or purchasing the Special Edition.

The pack contains missions uncovering the events which happened during the seven-year time span between the activation of the RFI in Infamous 2 and the storyline of Infamous: Second Son.

name: MiniMania
description: MiniMania is a social MMO designed for browsers and mobile devices, offering a seamless gaming experience on the go. Explore a vibrant virtual world where you can build, customize, and create your own unique spaces. Connect with players worldwide, embark on exciting adventures, and discover endless fun through creative interactions and activities. Dive into MiniMania and make the world your playground!

name: Coquette Dragoon: Volume One
description:
Cursed with misfortune from her very first breath in this world of endless war, the rabbit eared Xio's fate is changed forever as she is thrust into the prestigious life of a dragoon pilot—a role only one in ten thousand qualify for.

Coquette Dragoon is an alternative mecha/girls love serial visual novel combining comic and visual novel storytelling with 3D animation and backgrounds. Featuring a vivid cast from both sides of a war, it explores the different lives and perspectives in a world beset by tragedy, and those who seek love and connection as their escape from it.

name: Saucy Boy Adventures
description: Help Saucy Boy obtain condiments for his girlfriend, Saucy Girl, in this brisk and breezy cute-em-up adventure.

name: Shotdogs
description: Shotdogs is a comprehensive score-based arcade game about stone skipping, but with guns. Hurl your weapon across the endless depths to reach the next island, upgrade your arsenal at the hot dog stand, and even buy some cool hats.

name: Reticle Star
description:
Get the key and step on the goal.
If you get a star, you can use the dash.
Try to clear all 70 stages.

name: Pen Guns
description: PEN GUNS is a first-person coloring book. Choose from 4 available paintings and do your best to fill them with proper colors before the time limit is up!

name: Guitar Hero
description: A mobile version of the popular music game that was available from 2010-2014

name: NHL Hockey
description: Sega Game Gear port of NHL Hockey.

name: Need for Speed: Top Speed
description: A Need for Speed game released for web browsers.

name: Neopets: Codestone Quest
description: Neopets: Codestone Quest propels you into a classic conflict between good and evil in the fantasy world of Neopia. The alchemist Oswoc needs codestones to activate a mysterious and powerful spell, and you must travel to seven fantastic Faerie Rings to collect them. Trouble is brewing, though, as the evil Balthazar is kidnapping faeries in record numbers. Free the faeries, collect codestones, and save the day in this all-new, exciting Neopets adventure.

name: Myth II: Worlds
description: Re-release of Bungie's RTS cult-favorite Myth II: Soulblighter. The new edition includes a collection of user-created plugins, mods, campaigns, and multiplayer levels. It also contains map-making tools and a digital edition of the official Myth II strategy guide.

name: Mythical Warriors: Battle for Eastland
description:
The countries of Draco and Phoenix have come to blows in Eastland, the land of the gods. After an uneasy peace, they have both decided to conquer the entire land. But is it their own idea, or has the wizard Horus corrupted them both?

Battle for Eastland is a real-time strategy game, with a large number of magical forces. Each of the two sides has a distinct class list, and ranges from the basic (shamans and warriors), to the magical (dragons and golems). In total, 30 different troops are included. In addition, as a powerful wizard, you have the ability to drop game-changing spells on the battlefield, running off a recharging mana bar. By having your troops kill enemies, you will increase in level, which gives you access to the higher-end troops, spells, and research. Your experience is kept between battles in the campaign and skirmishes, opening up new tactics as time goes on. Single-player campaigns for both Draco and Phoenix are included, and previous levels may be replayed at any time. Also, 16 multi-player and skirmish maps are included. Finally, a level editor will let you create your own levels.

name: Milk Pot
description: The story follows a day in the life of a futanari girl with various indecent acts she commits in order to temper her uncontrollable sexual urges. One day in the life of a futanari girl and shows us various indecent acts she commits in order to temper her uncontrollable sexual urges.

name: Dole: 5 A Day Adventures
description: Dole: 5 A Day Adventures is an edutainment PC game.

name: Mario's Time Machine
description: The NES port of Mario's Time Machine is very different from the original 16-bit version, having more emphasis on platforming.

name: The Disappearing of Gensokyo: Patchouli
description: This pack will add Patchouli Knowledge to the game.

name: Rock Hoppers
description: A light-hearted but deep first person exploration and survival, base builder game for you and your friends set in a procedurally-generated asteroid belt on the edge of known space. Explore the world, learn new skills, build and defend your base, and conquer the belt's unique threats.

name: Incarnage
description:
Incarnage is an arcade-style top-down shooter that increases your speed the more you kill.
You play as Nilus, one of the lead soldiers in the rebellion against Kro-Tech and it's tyrannous rule over Krome. Fight through their forces of soldiers, mechanisms, and horrifying experiments as you move through Krome's various locales and destroy the source of the madness.

name: The Disappearing of Gensokyo: Sakuya, Koishi, Suika
description: This pack will add Izayoi Sakuya, Komeiji Koishi and Ibuki Suika to the game.

name: Mon Coach Personnel: J'ameliore Mon Anglais
Jack's House
description: It's a world of wonder and imagination, designed especially for children ages 2-8. From the moment your kids come over to play, they will be filled with delight. First they will meet Jack and truly lovable character who's hapy to show them aroiund. Jack's House uses a point and click format which teached hand-eye coordination. and each click revals a delightful surprise. They will learn the alphabet, color dinosaurs, sing a song, read a bonus storybook and learn about the Solar System, the change of seasons and more!! It is a game filled with joy and wonder for kids and the entire family.

name: John Deere: North American Farmer
description:
John Deere: North American Farmer is the sequel to the farming simulation, John Deere: American Farmer. Like most sequels, there is much of the same content from the original game with the addition of updates and new features.

There is new John Deere equipment, enhanced weather effects, new structures and additional farm animals. There are 10 new scenarios that add to the challenge of planning, building and managing a successful farm.

name: John Deere: Busy Days in Deerfield Valley
John Deere American Farmer: Deluxe Edition
Jericho Mirage
description: Puzzle game developed for the EA Pogo free-to-play casual game service.

name: The Disappearing of Gensokyo: Youmu, Yuyuko
description: This pack will add Kompaku Youmu and Saigyouji Yuyuko to the game.

name: The Disappearing of Gensokyo: Byakuren
description: This pack will add Hijiri Byakuren to the game.

name: Pokémon Korosu
description:
Pokémon Korosu is a Pokémon FireRed hack.
Pokémon Korosu is initially a story of revenge, loosely inspired by the film Kill Bill.
This is a story of a young lady whose family has been killed and she has been kidnapped by a harsh, mafia-like criminal group and has been doomed into a life of human slavery. Eventually, she escapes and she sets out for a quest to get revenge against those who have ruined her life.

name: JumpStart Advanced 2nd Grade
description: JumpStart Advanced 2nd Grade is a game originally released in 2002. It has since then been re-released alongside other various JumpStart Advanced 2nd Grade products.

name: JumpStart Advanced 1st Grade
description: In this game, the player participates in the JumpStartville Scooter Tournament. The player can collect power-ups to add to any of the seven main characters' scooters by playing activities around JumpStartville. Once the player has gathered enough power-ups, they can move to the arena to compete against the other racers.

name: JumpStart 3D Virtual World: The Legend of Grizzly McGuffin
description: In this game, the player must collect Scout Badges by completing tasks for the residents of JumpStart Town, and solve the mystery about the identity of Grizzly McGuffin, who was formerly the only scout to have ever collected all of the Scout Badges.

name: JumpStart 3D Virtual World: Quest for the Color Meister
description: The plot surrounds all of the characters going back to JumpStart camp after the events in JumpStart 3D Virtual World: Trouble in Town. In this game, a mysterious person that goes by the alias 'The Color Meister' begins to steal the color from certain parts of JumpStart World and goes on to hide it in a chest. The player must complete different challenges to unlock the chest.

name: JumpStart 3D Virtual World: My First Adventure
description: In the game, players create avatar characters to represent themselves, and play learning activities to earn pieces of storybooks.

name: Jojo's Fashion Show: World Tour
description: Jojo Cruz's designer daughter is flying the fashion coop and Jojo needs a new talent to replace her now famous offspring. Hit the runways from Tokyo to Barcelona dressing models in iconic couture, creating unique designs, and fending off scandals. Dress male and female models in styles worthy of the Las Cruces label and send them down the runway to wow the fashion world.

name: Stranglehold: Collectors Edition
description:
Stranglehold Collectors Edition includes;

- John Woo presents Stranglehold
- Poetry in Slow Motion: behind-the-scenes documentary
- Extended cinematic sequences
- Video showing the progression from concept art to the final game.
- Insider's look at the game's sound design
- John Woo's film Hard Boiled fully remastered in high-definition (PS3 only)

name: JumpStart Deep Sea Escape
description:
JumpStart Deep Sea Escape is a game for the Nintendo DS released in 2011. It teaches various concepts mainly for ages 5-8.

In this game, players explore an underwater world to rescue a stranded submarine. Along the way, players must collect oxygen tanks, solve puzzles, and defeat water monsters.

name: JumpStart Advanced Preschool: World Premium Edition
description: Includes more than 60 activities in total, each designed to develop over 25 skills in the areas of math, social studies, art, pre-reading, and critical thinking.

name: JumpStart Advanced Kindergarten: 2nd Grade - Lost Island Adventures
description: JumpStart Advanced Kindergarten: 2nd Grade - Lost Island Adventures is an educational game for kids.

name: JumpStart Advanced Kindergarten
description: JumpStart Advanced Kindergarten is a game originally released in 2002 as JumpStart Advanced Kindergarten. It is intended to cover various essential kindergarten skills.

name: JumpStart Advanced 3rd-5th Grade: Adventures of Dr. Brain
description: Educational game where the player is a member of the Secret Society of Dr. Brain, dedicated to exploration, adventure, and learning through time travel!

name: House Party: Doja Cat
description: Keep the wild and crazy party going with House Party’s first-ever expansion pack — featuring award-winning music star Doja Cat! This DLC adds hours of fun new content and branching stories to the House Party game's Original Story centering around and fully voice-acted by Doja Cat herself, as well as brand new content for all of the other House Party characters!

name: The Disappearing of Gensokyo With All Extra Characters
description: "The Disappearing of Gensokyo" is a Touhou Project doujin game from MyACG Studio, a Chinese doujin game fan circle. We have re-imagined Touhou as an ARPG, creating this "Danmaku-Shooting-ARPG". We hope this game will be a good experience for those who are both new and knowledgeable of Touhou!
